data.title: A DOOR INTO OCEAN
data.meta_description: New York: Arbor House, 1986 . Octavo, boards. First edition. The author's second SF book, preceded by novel STILL FORMS ON FOXFIELD 1980 . Winner of the 1987 John W. Campbell award for best novel. A classic of feminist SF. Anatomy of Wonder 2004 II-1047. Sargent, British and Utopian Literature, 1986-2009. Broderick and Di Filippo, Science Fiction: The 101 Best Novels, 1985-2010 #9. Hartwell,
data.text:
Slonczewski, Joan. A DOOR INTO OCEAN. New York: Arbor House, [1986]. Octavo, boards. First edition. The author's second SF book, preceded by novel STILL FORMS ON FOXFIELD (1980). Winner of the 1987 John W. Campbell award for best novel. A classic of feminist SF. Anatomy of Wonder (2004) II-1047. Sargent, British and Utopian Literature, 1986-2009. Broderick and Di Filippo, Science Fiction: The 101 Best Novels, 1985-2010 #9. Hartwell, 200 Significant SF Books by Women, 1984-2001. A fine copy in fine dust jacket. (#4742).

Price: $35.00
